constructor represents a micro card that can shocase a company logo with some punchlines and lighter descriptions. Whole card can be a link to a certain location or website. Below is a detailed description of the properties and attributes used in the
property in the component is a configuration object that allows customization of various styling aspects of the component. Each attribute within the
property targets a specific part of the component display, providing detailed control over its appearance and layout. Below is a detailed description of each attribute within the
Defines the overall styling for the container that holds all the elements of the component.
Styles applied to the image element, including properties like size and border radius.
Styles applied to the title text, such as font size and color.
Styles applied to the subtitle text, such as font size and color.
Styles applied to the text content, such as font size and color.
The URL that wraps the component, typically for navigation purposes.
The source URL of the image to be displayed.
Alternative text for the image, used for accessibility and in case the image fails to load.
The title text to be displayed.
The subtitle text to be displayed, if any.
The main text content to be displayed.

"grid grid-row-3 grid-flow-row rounded-2xl max-w-lg max-h-lg p-4 mx-auto justify-items-center text-center hover:scale-105 duration-300 bg-white border-2 border-neutral-300 dark:bg-zinc-800 hover:border-primary dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:border-primary"

These represent the class values utilized in the
constructor. These values are customizable and can be strengthened or overridden through the
grid grid-row-3 grid-flow-row border-2 rounded-2xl shadow-lg bg-red-100 max-w-lg max-h-lg p-4 mx-auto justify-items-center text-center hover:scale-105 duration-300 hover:bg-red-200

: Defines a grid layout with 3 rows and a row flow, applies a 2-pixel border, extra-large rounded corners, a large shadow, and a light red background. Limits maximum width and height to large sizes, adds padding, centers the element horizontally, centers items in the grid, centers text, scales up on hover, transitions the scaling, and changes the background color on hover.
relative mt-4 w-full h-auto flex shrink mx-auto
: Positions the image relative to its container, adds a top margin, ensures full width and automatic height adjustment, applies flexbox styling, prevents shrinking, and centers it horizontally.

: Similar to the image class, it positions the icon relative to its container, adds a top margin, ensures full width and automatic height adjustment, applies flexbox styling, prevents shrinking, and centers it horizontally.
: Sets the text size to 2xl, applies bold font weight, and sets the text color to black with a white color in dark mode.
: Applies semi-bold font weight, sets text size to large, uses a gray color for the text, and adds a top margin.
: Applies light font weight, sets text size to medium, uses a gray color for the text, and adds a top margin.
: Placeholder for default Tailwind CSS values, currently empty.
These style properties ensure that the
component is visually appealing and flexible, allowing for a wide range of customization to meet specific design requirements.
